name: 吳晧霙
objective:
本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.
schedule:

W2 L1
W3 L1
W4 L2
W5 L2
W6 L2
W7 L3
W8 L3
W9 Zwischenprufung
W10 L4
W11 L4
W12 L5
W13 L5
W14 L6
W15 L6
W16 L7
W17 L7
W18 Endprufung
scorePolicy:
期中口試40%
期末口試40%
出席+上課表現20%
materials:

Schritte International 1, Hueber Verlag
